title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Climbs 1.9% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aave (AAVE) gained 5.3% and NEAR Protocol (NEAR) rose 4.8%, leading the index higher.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3278.52, up 1.9% (+60.88) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: AAVE (+5.3%) and NEAR (+4.8%).
Laggards: POL (+0.6%) and BTC (+0.6%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index climbed 1.9% with all 20 assets trading higher, indicating broad market gains and positive momentum.
